verbs.description: [ARG0: state] [V: sen] [ARG1: marty] [ARG1: golden skydives] while receiving nypd disability pension the state senator who jumped out of an airplane in long island for a charity event has received over 1 million in tax - free disability pension benefits since retiring from the nypd in 1983 sen golden nypd pension board florida new york city sen marty golden skydives long island county cork disability long island sen marty golden skydives sen golden new york city police department senator nypd
